footer.companyDescription: A trusted platform for finding suitable accommodation for students in Assiut. We connect students with property owners safely and easily.
footer.copyright: All rights reserved to Yalla Sakan Â© {{year}}

home.heroTitle: Your Perfect Home in Assiut Awaits
home.heroDescription: Browse the best student apartments easily and safely. Are you a landlord?

howItWorks.title: Your Perfect Home in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorks.description: We've designed our platform to be easy and safe, ensuring a smooth experience from search to booking.
howItWorks.step1Description: Use our search engine to find the right apartments according to location, price and features.
howItWorks.step2Description: Communicate directly with apartment owners and check ratings to ensure credibility.
howItWorks.step3Description: Book your apartment after confirming details, and pay safely through the website or upon viewing.

whyUs.title: Why Trust
whyUs.description: We understand the importance of finding the right place where you feel comfortable and safe during your studies. That's why we put a platform at your fingertips that brings together everything you need.
whyUs.reason1Description: All apartments are reviewed and verified for accurate data and photo matching before being displayed on the platform.
whyUs.reason2Description: A specialized support team is available to help you with any problem or inquiry you may encounter during your search journey.
whyUs.reason3Description: Rely on ratings and reviews from real students who lived in these apartments to ensure transparency and credibility.

ownerCTA.title: Do You Have an Apartment for Rent? Register It Now!
ownerCTA.description: Join our community and register your apartment easily. Connect directly with students looking for housing and enjoy a smooth and safe experience managing your property.
ownerCTA.feature1Description: Connect your apartment directly with those looking for housing without intermediaries.
ownerCTA.feature2Description: Quick and easy registration form, add your apartment in minutes.
ownerCTA.feature3Description: Safe management of your property and full support from our team.

featuredApartments.title: Carefully Selected Apartments
featuredApartments.description: Browse the best apartments we've selected for you, distinguished by their excellent locations and services.
featuredApartments.loadError: Unable to load featured apartments at the moment.

scamStories.title: Scam Stories & Real Experiences
scamStories.story1Text: I paid a large deposit and it turned out the broker was a scammer. It took me a long time to get my money back.
scamStories.story2Text: The prices were much higher than what was written, and the system wasn't organized at all. I missed out on good apartments.
scamStories.story3Text: I had difficulty knowing which apartments were available and scheduling appointments. Everything was delayed and confusing.
scamStories.story4Text: Because of brokers, the apartment booking was cancelled after I paid the deposit. It was truly a terrifying experience.
scamStories.story5Text: Prices were double the normal rate, and there was no organization from owners or brokers at all.
